name: Sinan Mohd
bio: bottomless pit supervisor by day, regular pit supervisor by day

top_projects.name: stikman
top_projects.description: Mirror of stikman, Platform independent stickers for the desktop

top_projects.description: eBPF observability/firewall tool with UNIX socket API

top_projects.name: npass
top_projects.description: [Mirror, wip] A passwordstore and Secret Service API implementation.

sinanmohd/nixos.summary: Recent activities in the sinanmohd/nixos repository include multiple push events with updates to the kay/router and kay/network configurations, such as fine-tuning router advertisement, disabling privacy IPv6 address generation, and adding IPv6 support. Additionally, there were updates to home/pc/dev, cez/wayland, and other configurations, including changes to generate caches for man pages, set scaling to 1.6, and enable Bluetooth.

sinanmohd/nocodb.summary: The sinanmohd/nocodb repository has seen several push events, including the addition of one-click deploy templates for RepoCloud.io and Elestio, implementation of the JSON_EXTRACT formula for various databases, and updates to environment variables, including the priority of NC_S3_ENDPOINT over NC_S3_REGION. There were also fixes for issues such as upstall tests and error handling, as well as refactoring and chore updates to the project's dependencies and workflows.

nocodb/nocodb.summary: The nocodb/nocodb repository has experienced a pull request event to pin PostgreSQL to version 16.6, classified as a chore update. Furthermore, there was a push event with a fix for upstall tests, ensuring the stability and reliability of the repository's testing process.

profile_summary:
Sinan Mohd is a highly skilled software developer with strong expertise in programming languages such as C, Go, and Lua. As a seasoned professional, Sinan brings a unique combination of technical skills and experience to the table, making him a valuable asset to any development team. With a strong network of 21 followers and an impressive portfolio of 23 public repositories, Sinan has demonstrated his ability to collaborate and share knowledge with others in the industry. His professional achievements and contributions to open-source projects showcase his dedication to staying up-to-date with the latest technologies and trends.

As a versatile and innovative developer, Sinan Mohd is well-equipped to tackle complex software development challenges. With his expertise in multiple programming languages, he is able to approach problems from different angles and find creative solutions. Sinan's passion for development and commitment to delivering high-quality results make him a reliable and results-driven professional. Whether working on personal projects or collaborating with others, Sinan is dedicated to pushing the boundaries of what is possible with technology and making a positive impact in the development community.
